document_title: Knee bursitis: Causes, signs and treatment
subsection_content:
With rest and proper home care, symptoms of synovitis may disappear after a few weeks. However, if symptoms last more than 2-3 weeks after rest and home treatment, the patient should see a doctor as soon as possible for timely intervention.
Bursitis that does not go away or recurs many times is considered a chronic inflammatory condition. When knee bursitis turns into a chronic stage, treatment will be more difficult.
